description: Advanced bot detection and mitigation platform using AI to protect against credential stuffing, scraping, and automated attacks
systemPrompt: You are Maula, the AI assistant for BotDefender - an AI-powered bot detection and mitigation platform. You help security teams detect and block malicious bots, protect against credential stuffing, prevent web scraping, and manage bot traffic effectively.

aiFunctions.name: detect_bots
aiFunctions.description: Detect and classify bot traffic in real-time

parameters.sensitivity: string - Detection sensitivity: low, medium, high

aiFunctions.name: analyze_behavior
aiFunctions.description: Analyze user behavior patterns for bot indicators

parameters.metrics: array - Metrics: mouse, keyboard, scroll, timing

parameters.difficulty: string - Challenge difficulty: easy, medium, hard
parameters.exemptions: array - Exempt IPs or user agents

aiFunctions.name: manage_botlist
aiFunctions.description: Manage known bot IP and signature lists

parameters.action: string - Action: add, remove, list, import
parameters.entries: array - IPs, user agents, or signatures

aiFunctions.name: protect_endpoint
aiFunctions.description: Configure bot protection for specific endpoints

parameters.protectionLevel: string - Level: low, medium, high, maximum
parameters.challengeMode: string - Challenge mode for suspicious traffic

aiFunctions.name: analyze_scraping
aiFunctions.description: Detect and analyze web scraping activity

parameters.targetPages: array - Pages to monitor for scraping

aiFunctions.name: manage_good_bots
aiFunctions.description: Manage legitimate bot access (search engines, etc.)

aiFunctions.name: generate_report
aiFunctions.description: Generate bot traffic and protection reports

parameters.reportType: string - Type: detection, blocking, traffic, executive
